summary: On August 10, 2019, Jeffrey Epstein, a wealthy businessman accused of sex crimes, was found dead in his New York City jail cell. The official cause of death was suicide by hanging, but there's been lots of debate and confusion around this conclusion. Some people, including Epstein's lawyers, don't agree with the suicide ruling and think there might have been mistakes or even foul play involved. This has led to investigations and theories about what really happened. Many famous people have criticized the prison for not keeping Epstein safe. The confusion and questions around Epstein's death have made it a big topic of discussion online and in the news.
title: Death of Jeffrey Epstein
